title: Q5 - Can government bodies also be Data Fiduciaries? If yes, do they follow the same rules as private companies?
description: Yes. Under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA), government bodies and instrumentalities of the State can also act as Data Fiduciaries.
